email.subject: Two post-doctoral positions available at UCLouvain on edge/cloud computing

body.introduction: We invite applications for two postdoctoral positions at UCLouvain, Belgium.

positions.thematic_focus: open to the interest and expertise of the candidates

project.name: RAINDROP
project.research_focus: Investigates adaptation of traditional cloud applications to exploit distributed cloud and edge resources
current_research: autonomous adaptation and sharding of applications computation and state across sites
resource management of edge and cloud resources using performance models and queuing theory
automated analysis and visualization of data access patterns in cloud applications

independent_project.description: Each postdoctoral researcher will develop an independent research project
independent_project.mentorship: under the mentoring of three PIs
target_themes: Middleware and runtimes for distributed cloud applications
Scheduling and resource management for cloud/edge resources
Adaptation techniques for state and computation placement
Visualization and monitoring techniques for developer assistance
Performance modeling and simulation for cloud/edge applications

process.steps: Upon identification of a topic of common interest, candidates will be invited to send a more complete application package.
process.screening: Starts immediately and until positions are filled.

disclaimer.location_restriction: Positions only open to candidates currently outside Belgium
disclaimer.degree_requirement: Must hold a Ph.D. in computer science or a directly-related field at the start of the position
